pkgmetadata.longdescription: ### DS_COMMON_TOOL This repo including the model for data processing and model training with optuna. Supported model list: - LSTM - TCN - Transformer - Linear (Lasso, Ridge, ElasticNet) - Xgb Get package: ```rm -rf build dist *.egg-info*python3 -m buildpython3 -m twine upload dist/*``` ## [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/ds-common-tool/#description) ## [document](https://zhanglenus.gitbook.io/ds_common_tool-doc/)
